name: Gunslinger Osdeon
description:
Overview
This is a Railshooter that was created in RPG Maker. The gameplay was inspired of the action parts of 90's Hideo Kojima game Snatcher. It's a nice way to make a railshooter that doesn't use a mouse! Take control of Gunslinger Osdeon and blast your foes!

Version 1.1

  • Fixed crash bug during final boss fight (Please let me know if you still experience crashes!)
  • Added numpad support

Features

  • 8 levels filled with hot shooter action!
  • Unseen shooter action in RPG Maker!
  • Over 50 unique enemies!
  • Over 100 custom crafted sound effects!
  • Custom voiceover by myself!
  • Custom main menu!
  • Sound Test menu!
  • Menu Music by Popcornkid!
  • Monster Design by Thalzone!

Controls
arrow keys (or numpad keys) = move cursor
CTRL = shoot
SPACE = RELOAD
SHIFT = HOLY BOMB
F5 = fullscreen
F6 = change window size

Contact
Twitter :@kewlsnake
E-mail : runoshin@gmail.com

Credits
MAME cross = crosshair
Menu music = Pixel City by Popcornkid
Four-Dimensional Intercourse Pentagram by Deformed Elephant Surgery
Most monsters by Thalzone
Yanfly Engine Ace - Ace Core Engine v1.09
Fullscreen++ v2.2 for VX and VXace by Zeus81
Extend Timer Functionality by Shaz

PAUSE SCREEN by TDS
Full keyboard support by By Cidiomar R. Dias Junior
